jeopardy.name: REVIEWS OF FOOD WE DIDN'T EAT

questions.question: GREAT SCOTT! THIS IS THE YEAR DISNEYLAND OPENED.
IN 1972, THIS AREA OF DISNEYLAND OPENED AS "BEAR COUNTRY". IN 1988, IT WAS RENAMED TO THIS.
ONE OF THE MAIN ATTRACTIONS IN MICKEY'S TOONTOWN FAIR IS GADGET'S GO COASTER, NAMED AFTER A CHARACTER FROM THIS DISNEY AFTERNOON TV SHOW.
questions.answer: What is Chip and Dale's Rescue Rangers?

questions.question: THIS FUTURE PRESIDENT WAS AT THE OPENING OF DISNEYLAND.
THIS IS CONSIDERED THE "LOST LAND" OF DISNEYLAND OPENING ON JUNE 16, 1957 AND CLOSING IN SEPTEMBER 1961.
HOLD ON TO YOUR TASSELS! THIS IS THE NEWEST ATTRACTION IN ADVENTURELAND.
questions.answer: What is the Magic Carpets of Aladdin?

questions.question: A REPLICA OF THE HOUSE OF BURGESSES IN LIBERTY SQUARE HAS TWO LANTERNS IN THE WINDOW FOR THIS MAN'S EPIC RIDE.
THE STATUE OF ROY DISNEY AND MINNIE MOUSE HOLDS THIS TITLE.
ON OPENING DAY, THESE WERE THE ONLY TWO OPERATIONAL RIDES IN TOMORROWLAND
questions.answer: What are the Skyway and the Speedway?

questions.question: THE MAYOR OF MAIN STREET USA IS NOT JUSTIN HEYMAN, BUT RATHER THIS PERSON
THAT BIG BLUE THING THAT USED TO BE IN THE MIDDLE BLOCKING THE CHINESE THEATER. THAT WAS AN EYESORE.
THAT HOST GUY IN THE GREAT MOVIE RIDE
THAT DINOSAUR IN ECHO LAKE THAT SERVES ICE CREAM
THAT FAKE RECORD STUDIO NAME IN THE ROCK'N ROLLER COASTER
THAT GREEN SCREEN SHOW THAT USED TO BE IN WHAT IS NOW KNOWN AS THE HYPERION THEATER
ALTHOUGH THIS ANIMAL DOES NOT RESIDE IN DISNEY'S ANIMAL KINGDOM, IT WILL SOON MAKE ITS APPEARANCE AT DISNEY SPRINGS.
THIS ANIMAL IS BETTER KNOWN IN ITS ANIMATED FORM.
THIS IS TOM CORLESS'S FAVORITE ANIMAL ON KILIMANJARO SAFARIS.
ALTHOUGH THIS ANIMAL HAS LEGS THAT LOOK LIKE THAT OF A ZEBRA, IT IS ACTUALLY THE ONLY LIVING RELATIVE OF THE GIRAFFE.
YOU CAN SEE THIS BUG AROUND DISCOVERY ISLAND IN A PLEXIGLASS BOX. IF YOU HEAR ONE OUT OF THE BOX, YOU MAY WANT TO MOVE IT, MOVE IT!
questions.answer: What is the Madagascar Hissing Cockroach?

questions.question: THE CORN DOG CASTLE REIGNS SUPREME IN THIS AREA OF DISNEY'S CALIFORNIA ADVENTURE.
MONSTERS INC: MIKE AND SULLY TO THE RESCUE REPLACED THIS OPENING DAY DARK RIDE.
IT'S NOT IN FANTASYLAND ANYMORE, BUT THIS CHARACTER RESTAURANT HAS ALWAYS BEEN IN CALIFORNIA ADVENTURE WITH THE SAME NAME.
THIS IS THE ORIGINAL NIGHTTIME SHOW HELD AT DISNEY'S CALIFORNIA ADVENTURES.
CARS LAND WAS BUILT ON THE AREA OF LAND FORMERLY KNOWN AS THIS.
questions.answer: What is the Timon parking lot?
What is the Universe of Energy/Ellen's Energy Adventure?

questions.question: THIS ATTRACTION FEATURING A CAR, AN AIRPLANE, AND EVEN A SPACESHIP CLOSED IN 2017 TO GIVE WAY TO A RAILWAY.
questions.answer: What is The Great Movie Ride?

questions.question: THIS LOCATION WAS SUPPOSED TO HOUSE BEASTLY KINGDOM; AFTER BUDGET CUTS, THIS WAS BUILT INSTEAD.
TOMORROW DIDN'T COME WHEN THIS FUTURISTIC EPCOT ATTRACTION FINALLY MET THE WRECKING BALL IN 2000.

questions.answer: What is the Hall of Presidents
What is Journey Into Your Imagination
What is the Monsters Inc. Laugh Floor?

questions.question: ON THIS ATTRACTION, YOUR GUIDE MAY POINT OUT THEIR FAVORITE TREES - LIKE THAT ONE, THAT ONE, AND THAT ONE.
THE TREEHOUSE VILLAS ORIGINALLY OPENED IN 1975 AND WERE PART OF THE VILLAGE RESORT, THE DISNEY VILLAGE RESORT, AND THE DISNEY INSTITUTE, BEFORE BECOMING PART OF THIS RESORT IN 2004.
questions.answer: What is Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa?

questions.question: THIS IS DESIGNED FROM AN UPSIDE-DOWN OIL RIG.
questions.answer: What is the Tree of Life?

questions.question: 13 LANTERNS HANG FROM THIS TREE.
SONG OF THE RAINFOREST AT RAFIKI'S PLANET WATCH WAS HOSTED BY THIS WOODSY POCAHONTAS CHARACTER.
YOU CAN DINE UNDER THE STARS (ON A SOUNDSTAGE, OF COURSE) AT THIS RESTAURANT THEMED TO A ONCE-POPULAR WAY OF SEEING MOVIES.
questions.answer: What is the Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant?

questions.question: DORMA NESMOND, PAIGE TURNER, AND DARA VAMP WERE ONCE PART OF THIS ROVING ENSEMBLE.
questions.answer: Who are the Citizens of Hollywood?

questions.question: THIS HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS ATTRACTION OPENED MAY 16TH, 1991, EXACTLY ONE YEAR AFTER THE DEATH OF ITS STARRING CHARACTERS' CREATOR.
ACCORDING TO LEGEND, FIVE PEOPLE AT THE HOLLYWOOD TOWER HOTEL WERE THROWN INTO THE TWILIGHT ZONE WHEN LIGHTNING STRUCK THEIR ELEVATOR IN THIS YEAR.
THE ENTRANCE TO THIS FORMER UPSTAIRS TAPHOUSE COULD BE FOUND JUST OFF TO THE SIDE OF THE HOLLYWOOD BROWN DERBY.
THE HOLLYWOOD HILLS AMPHITHEATER HOSTS THIS NIGHTTIME SPECTACULAR.
THIS REPLACED THE CELEBRATE A DREAM COME TRUE PARADE IN 2014.
questions.answer: What is the Festival of Fantasy Parade?

questions.question: WHEN THIS DISNEY CRUISE LINE SHIP LAUNCHED IN 2012, MARIAH CAREY WAS NAMED ITS GODMOTHER.
VISITORS CAN DODGE DANCING HIPPOS AND AN ARMY OF BROOMS AT THIS PUTTING GREEN.
questions.answer: What is Fantasia Gardens Mini Golf?

questions.question: BIG BERTHA, A TURN-OF-THE-CENTURY ORGAN FROM FRANCE, CAN BE FOUND AT THIS RESORT RESTAURANT.
"IF WE WEREN'T IN THE SHOW STARTING RIGHT AWAY, WE'D BE IN THE AUDIENCE TOO."
questions.answer: What is "The Tiki, Tiki, Tiki Room"

questions.question: "AMERICA, KEEP ON FLYING NOW, KEEP YOUR SPIRIT FREE, FACING NEW FRONTIERS."
"AND BIG FRED'S PLAYIN' MOUTH HARP, HE PLAYS IT KIND OF SAD; HE NEVER TOOK A LESSON, HE JUST PICKED IT UP FROM DAD."
"THE NEW FRONTIER WE FACE IS THE MYSTERY OF SPACE."
"YESTERDAY'S MEMORIES MAY SPARKLE AND GLEAM, TOMORROW IS STILL BUT A DREAM."

final-jeopardy.question: BESIDES THE CAROUSEL OF PROGRESS, THE ONLY OTHER ATTRACTION WHICH HAS A SCENE THAT TAKES PLACE ON CHRISTMAS.
